column2: "It's good to do your best, but don't overdo it."
"I think you may hear that too often, but it's when people get used to all the fighting that they start letting their guard down."

"If you stick with your friends, then
it's that much safer."
"But I guess those words don't carry much weight when I'm off here alone."
"There's not much I can do about that except getting back to looking for Echo."
